languages.text: "Вернусь к братьям и спою сагу о Зловещем вое. Донесу ее до самого Фенриса, пролью ее звонкие висы в уши ярла и самого Великого Волка. Ее горячие слова будут греть нас в суровый Хельвинтр". {n}Ульфар улыбается.{/n} "А братья за столом будут пихать друг друга локтями, тыкать в меня пальцем и почтительно говорить: "Это он сложил столь прекрасную сагу! Как же щедр к нему был Всеотец!"

"I will return to my brothers and sing the saga of the Baleful Howl pack. I will carry it all the way to Fenris and pour its ringing verses into the ears of the Jarl and the Great Wolf himself. Its burning words will warm us during the fierce Helwinter." {n}Ulfar grins.{/n} "And the brothers at the table will nudge each other and point their fingers at me and say, 'It was he who crafted such a beautiful saga! How generous the Allfather has been to him!'"
languages.original_text: "Вернусь к братьям и спою сагу о Зловещем вое. Донесу ее до самого Фенриса, пролью ее звонкие висы в уши ярла и самого Великого Волка. Ее горячие слова будут греть нас в суровый Хельвинтр". {n}Ульфар улыбается.{/n} "А братья за столом будут пихать друг друга локтями, тыкать в меня пальцем и почтительно говорить: "Это он сложил столь прекрасную сагу! Как же щедр к нему был Всеотец!"

traits.locale_text: "I will return to my brothers and sing the Famehungry pack saga. I will carry it to Fenris itself, spill its ringing visur into the ears of the Jarl and the Great Wolf himself. Its burning words will warm us during the fierce Helwinter." {n}Ulfar grins.{/n} "And the brothers at the table will elbow each other, point their fingers at me and say, 'It was he who put together such a beautiful saga! How generous the Allfather was to him!'"

"I will return to my brothers and sing the Famehungry pack saga. I will carry it to Fenris itself, spill its ringing visur into the ears of the Jarl and the Great Wolf himself. Its burning words will warm us during the fierce Helwinter." {n}Ulfar grins.{/n} "And the brothers at the table will elbow each other, point their fingers at me and say, 'It was he who put together such a beautiful saga! How generous the Allfather was to him!'"

How generous the Allfather has been to him!'"

Its burning words will warm us during the fierce Helwinter." {n}Ulfar grins.{/n} "And the brothers at the table will nudge each other and point their fingers at me and say, 'It was he who crafted such a beautiful saga! How generous the Allfather has been to him!'"

How generous the Allfather has been to him!'"

languages.text: “我要回到我的兄弟们身边，唱响怒嚎者狼群的史诗。我要把他们的史诗一路带到芬里斯，把那铿锵有力的诗句灌入领主与巨狼的耳朵里。那些熊熊燃烧的话语，将会为我们带来暖意，度过冰冷的赫尔之冬。”{n}乌尔法笑了起来。{/n}“到时候，我坐在桌边的兄弟们会互相推搡，用手指着我，说：‘是他写出了如此美妙的史诗！全父待他何等慷慨！’”
languages.original_text: "I will return to my brothers and sing the saga of the Baleful Howl pack. I will carry it all the way to Fenris and pour its ringing verses into the ears of the Jarl and the Great Wolf himself. Its burning words will warm us during the fierce Helwinter." {n}Ulfar grins.{/n} "And the brothers at the table will nudge each other and point their fingers at me and say, 'It was he who crafted such a beautiful saga! How generous the Allfather has been to him!'"

traits.locale_text: “我要回到我的兄弟们身边，唱响渴名者狼群的史诗。我要把他们的史诗一路带到芬里斯，把那铿锵有力的诗句灌入领主与巨狼的耳朵里。那些熊熊燃烧的话语，将会为我们带来暖意，度过冰冷的赫尔之冬。”{n}乌尔法笑了起来。{/n}“到时候，我坐在桌边的兄弟们会互相推搡，用手指着我，说：‘是他写出了如此美妙的史诗！全父待他何等慷慨！’”

languages.text: «Volveré con mis hermanos para cantar la saga de la jauría del Aullido Torvo. La llevaré hasta Fenris y derramaré sus versos resonantes en los oídos del Jarl y el mismísimo Gran Lobo. Sus palabras ardientes nos calentarán durante el terrible Invierno de Hela». {n}Ulfar sonríe.{/n} «Y mis hermanos en la mesa se darán golpes con el codo y me señalarán con el dedo para decir "¡Ha sido él el que ha creado una saga tan hermosa! ¡El Padre de todas las cosas le ha sonreído!"».
languages.original_text: "I will return to my brothers and sing the saga of the Baleful Howl pack. I will carry it all the way to Fenris and pour its ringing verses into the ears of the Jarl and the Great Wolf himself. Its burning words will warm us during the fierce Helwinter." {n}Ulfar grins.{/n} "And the brothers at the table will nudge each other and point their fingers at me and say, 'It was he who crafted such a beautiful saga! How generous the Allfather has been to him!'"

traits.locale_text: «Volveré con mis hermanos para cantar la saga de la jauría del Aullido Torvo. La llevaré hasta Fenris y derramaré sus versos resonantes en los oídos del Jarl y el mismísimo Gran Lobo. Sus palabras ardientes nos calentarán durante el terrible Invierno de Hela». {n}Ulfar sonríe.{/n} «Y mis hermanos en la mesa se darán golpes con el codo y me señalarán con el dedo para decir "¡Ha sido él el que ha creado una saga tan hermosa! ¡El Padre de todas las cosas le ha sonreído!"».

languages.text: 「兄弟たちのもとへ戻り、破滅の咆哮の群れのサーガを歌おうじゃないか。それをフェンリスの元まで運び、鳴り響く詩をヤールと大狼の耳に流し込むんだ。その燃え盛る言霊は、荒れ狂うヘルウィンターの間、俺たちを温めてくれるだろう」{n}ウルファーはにやりと笑う。{/n}「そして、テーブルを囲む兄弟たちはお互いをなじり合い、俺を指差して、『こんな見事なサーガを作ったのは奴だ！全知の父はなんと寛大なお方だ！』と言うのさ」
languages.original_text: "I will return to my brothers and sing the saga of the Baleful Howl pack. I will carry it all the way to Fenris and pour its ringing verses into the ears of the Jarl and the Great Wolf himself. Its burning words will warm us during the fierce Helwinter." {n}Ulfar grins.{/n} "And the brothers at the table will nudge each other and point their fingers at me and say, 'It was he who crafted such a beautiful saga! How generous the Allfather has been to him!'"

traits.locale_text: 「兄弟たちのもとへ戻り、破滅の咆哮の群れのサーガを歌おうじゃないか。それをフェンリスの元まで運び、鳴り響く詩をヤールと大狼の耳に流し込むんだ。その燃え盛る言霊は、荒れ狂うヘルウィンターの間、俺たちを温めてくれるだろう」{n}ウルファーはにやりと笑う。{/n}「そして、テーブルを囲む兄弟たちはお互いをなじり合い、俺を指差して、『こんな見事なサーガを作ったのは奴だ！全知の父はなんと寛大なお方だ！』と言うのさ」

languages.text: "Ich kehre zu meinen Brüdern zurück und singe die Saga vom Baleful-Howl-Rudel. Ich trage sie bis nach Fenris und gieße ihre klangvollen Verse in die Ohren des Jarls und des Großen Wolfs selbst. Ihre brennenden Worte werden uns im bitteren Helwinter wärmen." {n}Ulfar grinst.{/n} "Und die Brüder am Tisch werden einander mit den Ellenbogen anstoßen und mit den Fingern auf mich zeigen und sagen: 'Er hat diese wunderschöne Saga geschrieben! Wie großzügig der Allvater zu ihm war!'"
languages.original_text: "I will return to my brothers and sing the saga of the Baleful Howl pack. I will carry it all the way to Fenris and pour its ringing verses into the ears of the Jarl and the Great Wolf himself. Its burning words will warm us during the fierce Helwinter." {n}Ulfar grins.{/n} "And the brothers at the table will nudge each other and point their fingers at me and say, 'It was he who crafted such a beautiful saga! How generous the Allfather has been to him!'"

traits.locale_text: "Ich kehre zu meinen Brüdern zurück und singe die Saga vom Baleful-Howl-Rudel. Ich trage sie bis nach Fenris und gieße ihre klangvollen Verse in die Ohren des Jarls und des Großen Wolfs selbst. Ihre brennenden Worte werden uns im bitteren Helwinter wärmen." {n}Ulfar grinst.{/n} "Und die Brüder am Tisch werden einander mit den Ellenbogen anstoßen und mit den Fingern auf mich zeigen und sagen: 'Er hat diese wunderschöne Saga geschrieben! Wie großzügig der Allvater zu ihm war!'"

languages.text: « J'irai retrouver mes frères et je chanterai la saga des Hurleurs sanguinaires. Je la porterai jusqu'à Fenris et je déverserai ses couplets retentissants dans les oreilles du jarl et du Loup Suprême en personne. Ses mots brûlants nous réchaufferont dans la froidure de l'Hiver Infernal, {n}déclare Ulfar en souriant.{/n} Et mes frères attablés joueront des coudes et me désigneront du doigt en m'applaudissant, moi, l'auteur de cette noble geste et le protégé du Père de Tous ! »
languages.original_text: "I will return to my brothers and sing the saga of the Baleful Howl pack. I will carry it all the way to Fenris and pour its ringing verses into the ears of the Jarl and the Great Wolf himself. Its burning words will warm us during the fierce Helwinter." {n}Ulfar grins.{/n} "And the brothers at the table will nudge each other and point their fingers at me and say, 'It was he who crafted such a beautiful saga! How generous the Allfather has been to him!'"

languages.text: "Kardeşlerimin yanına döneceğim ve Uğursuz Uluma sürüsünün efsanesine dair şarkılar söyleyeceğim. Onu ta Fenris'e kadar taşıyacağım ve satırlarının ezgisini Yarl'ın ve Ulu Kurt'un bizzat kendi kulaklarına ulaştıracağım. Yakıcı sözleri bizi Acı Kış'ın hışmında sıcak tutacaktır." {n}Ulfar sırıtıyor.{/n} "Masadaki kardeşlerim birbirlerini sarsacak, parmaklarıyla beni gösterecek ve diyecekler ki 'Bu muazzam efsaneyi yaratan işte budur! Yücebaba ona ne kadar da cömert davranmış!'"
languages.original_text: "I will return to my brothers and sing the saga of the Baleful Howl pack. I will carry it all the way to Fenris and pour its ringing verses into the ears of the Jarl and the Great Wolf himself. Its burning words will warm us during the fierce Helwinter." {n}Ulfar grins.{/n} "And the brothers at the table will nudge each other and point their fingers at me and say, 'It was he who crafted such a beautiful saga! How generous the Allfather has been to him!'"
